text: 1. The participant must have a valid Kriya ID registered from www.psgkriya.in
2. The photos must strictly adhere to the topics mentioned.
3. A maximum of one photo can be submitted.
4. The photos along with the Kriya ID, name of the participant, name of the college along with a suitable caption should be sent to web@psgkriya.in
5. The photo must be of HD quality.
6. The photo must taken only by the participant. It must not be downloaded from anywhere else or must be plagiarized.
8. The winner of the event will be announced on 20.02.2020
9. The participant must have paid the Kriya General Registration Fee to be eligible to get the prize and certificate
